title: Emotes disappearing
body:
So I just updated my league client to version 8.15, once I have logged in and have received my lvl 4 honor capsule, I went to go and check my new emote that I got from the capsule (which was the "excited kitty" emote). I went and checked but I noticed that my other emotes have disappeared except for my "d'pengu" and "excited kitty" emotes. I have already written up a bug report to Riot Games but idk how this has happened. I don't know if this has happened to anyone else but I would like this problem to be resolved as quickly as possible.

(Up top is a screenshot of my emotes before receiving the "excited kitty" emote) 
I just realized that I don't even have the default thumbs up emote XDDD

So I went to confirm this to my friend, they say that some of their emotes (most notably their "thumbs up" emote which I find funny) are missing as well. I think that the emotes that are missing are emotes you normally can't get such as legacy emotes. I have checked how many emotes there are previously, which says on the screenshot 9/60 emotes required for me, but now it says 2/51 emotes required (since I just got my new emote). The emotes that I only see in the emotes required are the ones you can only get in the store and nowhere else.

replies.body: Don't worry, half of my emotes have disappeared as well. However, Some of the emotes you can get in the store, such as the Lunar lux emote, have disappeared as well for me :({{champion:99}}

Yeah, I can't view my emotes in the collection but however, I can still use them in game so yeah I don't even know what's going on :/
But Riot is already trying to fix this bug if you were to look at the exclamation mark next to the "play" button at the top left in the league client. There should be a status service up.

https://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce

{{champion:92}}
